alert.note: Alert for Highlands; Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Highlands and central Polk Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 230 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Lake Wales to 9 miles north of Avon Park to 9 miles northeast of Venus. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Winter Haven, Haines City, Lake Wales, Auburndale, Sebring, Avon Park, Jan Phyl Village, Poinciana, Lake Alfred, Crooked Lake Park, Dundee, Frostproof, Davenport, Eagle Lake, Lake Hamilton, Hillcrest Heights, Highland Park, Indian Lake Estates, Winter Haven Airport and Wahneta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
